## Hi, I'm Tam

<p> With years of experience in Business Analysis and Project Management, I am now eager to embark on a new journey in Data Analytics. I aim to leverage my expertise in both business and data analytics to uncover insightful data stories that support stakeholders in making informed decisions.</p>

<p>I have been actively exploring Data Analytics and Data Science through LinkedIn Learning, Coursera, and various online resources. This learning journey has equipped me with:</p>
  
- **General Skills:** Statistical Analysis, Data Visualization, Data Preparation, Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA), Predictive Analytics (PRA), and Machine Learning
- **Technical Skills:** Proficiency in IBM SPSS, R Programming, Python, and Tableau.
- **Machine Learning Algorithms:** Knowledge of Linear Regression, Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, Random Forest, XGBoost, SVM, k-NN, and K-means Clustering.
  
This portfolio showcases my achievements and capabilities as I transition into a Business Analytics professional.</p>
I am excited about the opportunity to work in Data Analytics and look forward to contributing to this dynamic field.</p>
